item.description:
Since there was some interest in having a Filipino get together I thought I would host a Filipino Feast! I'll order Lumpia and Adobo from JNJ Turo Turo, this region's best (and only) Filipino restaurant plus I'm going to make my mom's Embutido (Filipino-style Meatloaf). Of course, there will be rice too.

Please bring something to share with everyone (doesn't have to be Filipino food.) I have a small place so I will have to limit the # of families to 5. As the date approaches I will email the attendees my contact info.
item.name: Filipino Potluck and Playdate
